title: Amazon Code Doesn't Work
body: I bought a $10 RP LoL code from Amazon they send me the code but when I insert the code it tells me invalid. Is there a way I can redeem them or at least get a replacement code? Or any solutions?

replies.body:
I'm guessing you might have one of the Amazon PIN codes, which can admittedly be a little weird for some people (myself included). You need to put those codes in the format "REP-US-123-4ABCDEF5G6HIJK78" including the letters. 

If that's not the type of code you got, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I don't want either of us accidentally posting that code xD!
